definition: Ai (c. 2000 BC), sixth of legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God, also known as Li 釐|厘[Li2]
sorrow/grief/pity/to grieve for/to pity/to lament/to condole

sentences.english: Through the sadness of all things I hear the crooning of the Eternal Mother.
sentences.chinese: 在萬物的哀愁裏，我聽到了“永恆母親”的柔聲細語。

sentences.english: Just, the sorrow of parting was camouflaged by the dark night at that moment.
sentences.chinese: 只是，那時夜晚的黑幕遮蔽了離別的哀愁。

sentences.english: Trust love even if it brings sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 即使愛只給你帶來了哀愁，也信任它。

sentences.english: Those of black smoke came damp, suddenly, the guy red sad.
sentences.chinese: 羞澀的眼色碰上受潮的煙，倏忽，哀愁的眼孔通紅。

sentences.english: Your hair is beautiful and sad, just as your soul.
sentences.chinese: 你的頭髮美麗而哀愁，就像你的靈魂。

sentences.english: Even deliberately seeking a touch of sadness, to express the feelings of loneliness sad.
sentences.chinese: 甚至刻意追求一種淡淡的哀愁，抒發孤獨傷感的情懷。

sentences.english: But sorrow is strong and abiding.
Never resign yourself to letting fate run its course if it makes you unhappy.
sentences.chinese: 永遠不要輕言放棄，任由天數左右你的喜怒哀愁。

sentences.english: And weep afresh love's long since cancell'd woe.
sentences.chinese: 我重新哭泣愛情久已過去的哀愁。

sentences.english: Just hear out the bird in the air twittering its chilly woos.
sentences.chinese: 只聽那臨風的鳥兒啾一聲最後的哀愁。

sentences.english: Not thinking about sadness, only to enjoy the autumn scenery.
sentences.chinese: 不再思索哀愁，一心只爲欣賞秋雨的景色。

sentences.english: When she heard say"no", a wave of sadness caught her.
sentences.chinese: 當她聽到答案是“不”的時候，一波哀愁佔了她。

sentences.english: Joy is like the people's wings make one fly, while sorrow drives one diligent.
sentences.chinese: 歡樂是人們的雙翼，哀愁是使人發憤的動力。

sentences.english: I was in a world of great sorrow.
What sweet voice does sing in such a woebegone tone?
sentences.chinese: 是誰如此甜美的嗓音將哀愁歌唱？

sentences.english: Only gives fully in prose of filar detailed sorrow to affect my nerve.
sentences.chinese: 只有散文中透出的絲縷哀愁才能牽動我的神經。
